about.title: Dr. Ashurova Feruza, MD
about.subtitle: PURE & PRECISE.
about.description: Dr. Ashurova Feruza is an aesthetic physician from Central Asia known for measured, natural results. Her approach combines medical diagnostics with careful technique to enhance features without overcorrection.
list: • Board-certified physician with 10+ years in clinical and aesthetic medicine
• Personalized injection planning (botulinum toxin, HA fillers, collagen stimulators)
• Skin quality protocols: biorevitalization, PRP/PRF, medical peels
• Focus on facial balance, safety, and transparent aftercare
about.note: By appointment only — New York & Tashkent
about.microcopy: Each consultation begins with diagnostics, not trends. Every plan — personal, safe, and precise.

works.title: Real results of sérendipité
works.lead: Each case is a personalised correction plan that preserves natural features. We capture the starting point, select precise techniques, and monitor every stage.

first.title: Structural correction of the midface
first.description: Subtle replenishment of cheekbone and nasolabial volume to improve support, refresh the gaze, and smooth facial lines without heaviness.

second.title: Balancing the lower third and profile
second.description: Working with lip contour and chin to strengthen the profile and define the oval. Cannula techniques and soft fillers provide a precise finish.

process.title: How we work
process.description: Every session begins with diagnostics and 3D facial assessment. Based on the collected data we craft a personalised protocol, discuss stages and expectations, and document aftercare.

preparation.title: Preparing for the procedure
preparation.description: Diagnostics, plan discussion, and preparation of products.

technique.title: Technique and control
technique.description: Implementing the plan with a focus on accuracy and safety.
